Commands.Waterwhirl: 4-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Medium Debuff Success Rate Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Waterwhirl+: 4-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Medium Debuff Success Rate Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Cannonfire: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants a small probability of inflicting Poison, Small Attack Down and Small Defense for 3 turns.
Commands.Cannonfire+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Raises the success rate of debuffs to Medium.
Commands.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns when an enemy is afflicted with debuffs  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Thunderstorm: 6-HIT Thunder, Water and Wind AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies  Grants 「Syldra's Blessing」 for 2 turns   While 「Syldra's Blessing」 is active:  - Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit  - Triggers 「Whirlpool」 after every enemy turn  　∟ 2-HIT Water ranged BRV attack  　∟ Raises allies' BRV based on BRV damage dealt  　∟ Cannot initiate a Chase Sequence  　∟ (Same special effect will not stack)

Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Waterwhirl Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Waterwhirl.
Passives.Master Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV after mastering an ability.
Passives.Cannonfire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Cannonfire.
Passives.Cannonfire Charge: Increases the max uses of Cannonfire by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Waterwhirl Charge: Increases the max uses of Waterwhirl by 1.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Leader's Command: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV of all allies when HP is under 50%.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Waterwhirl Extend: Waterwhirl  use +2Reduces mastery requirement of  Waterwhirl  by 1When using  Waterwhirl ,  Waterwhirl+ :- Slightly raises BRV potency- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets- Grants  Pirate's Style  for 6 turns- Lowers Action Delay- Triggers an HP attack after useWhen using  Waterwhirl :- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRVWhen using  Waterwhirl+ :- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhile  Pirate's Style  is active:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises total BRV potency- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets Pirate's Style  raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed
Passives.Master Boost&Speed All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Speed after mastering an ability.
Passives.Cannonfire Extend: Cannonfire  use +3When using  Cannonfire ,  Cannonfire+ :- Becomes AoE- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4- Moderately raises total BRV potency- Moderately improves the effects of  Poison - Slightly improves the effects of  Attack Down  and  Defense Down - Triggers an AoE HP attack after use- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemiesWhen using  Cannonfire :- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRVWhen using  Cannonfire+ :- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Debuff Attack Up Extend: When using  Debuff Attack Up , adds the following effect:- BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount

Weapons.Orichalcum Dirk CP: 35: Increases Cannonfire's potency and allows it to be mastered after 1 use.Increases the potency of Poison, Attack Down and Defense Down, extends their duration to 8 turns and raises their success rate.Inflicts Small Max BRV Down for 8 turns.Removes all buffs before inflicting debuffs when mastered.
Weapons.Assassin Dagger CP: 15: Increases Waterwhirl's potency and extends the duration of Debuff Success Rate Up.
Weapons.Air Knife CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Thunderstorm
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Debuff Attack Up  use +1Duration of  Debuff Attack Up  effects +2 turns
